entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Complex.Sin/Cos regressions in .NET 9 #105997
    9.0.0
  • ColorTranslator.ToWin32 is inefficient #105992
  • Out of range exception on system without a WINS configuration #105991
  • Port System.Runtime.Intrinsics docs for .NET 9 APIs #105989
    9.0.0
  • Port CodeDom, Net, CompilerServices and Text docs for .NET 9 APIs #105988
    9.0.0
  • Port System docs for .NET 9 APIs #105987
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Runtime.InteropServices docs for .NET 9 APIs #105986
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Threading.Tasks docs for .NET 9 APIs #105985
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Linq docs for .NET 9 APIs #105984
    9.0.0
  • Port System.ComponentModel docs for .NET 9 APIs #105983
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Reflection docs for .NET 9 APIs #105982
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Numerics docs for .NET 9 APIs #105981
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Diagnostics docs for .NET 9 APIs #105980
    9.0.0
  • Port System.IO docs for .NET 9 APIs #105979
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Buffers docs for .NET 9 APIs #105978
    9.0.0
  • Port Microsoft.Extensions.Caching docs for .NET 9 APIs #105977
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Collections docs for .NET 9 APIs #105976
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Drawing docs for .NET 9 APIs #105975
    9.0.0
  • Documenting .NET 9 APIs #105974
    9.0.0
  • JIT: checked-release asmdiffs for libraries_tests.run.linux.arm64.Release.mch #105971
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'numArgs == 2' during 'Linear scan register alloc' with `Avx512F.VL.Fixup` and `Avx512F.VL.Shuffle2x128` #105970
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Potential bad codegen with `Avx512BW` intrinsic functions #105969
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'childNode->canBeContained()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' with `Avx512F.FixupScalar` #105968
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'varDsc->GetRegNum() == REG_STK' during 'Generate code' with `Avx512F.Fixup` #105967
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `Avx512F.Min` #105966
    9.0.0
  • [Test] Issue with DecorateWithSkipOnCoreClrConfiguration #105964
  • [.NET 6] Binding to non-null `IReadOnlyDictionary` doesn't work #105960
    Future
  • Compiling .NET 8 into native AOT was detected as a trojan virus by antivirus software. #105959
  • Appending formatted `StringBuilder` into itself requires documenting on reference #105957
  • JIT: Assertion failed `user->OperIs(GT_CALL) && dsc->IsHiddenBufferStructArg() && (user->AsCall()->gtArgs.GetRetBufferArg()->GetNode() == lcl)` #105952
    9.0.0
  • Can address overflow in RhpNewFast? #105949
    10.0.0
  • ILC Compile errors during publishing #105947
    Future
  • JIT: `GetFfr` hw intrinsics are not modelled appropriately by value numbering #105944
    9.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24379.15] Fail to load page in nopCommerceNetCore app after retargeting it to .NET 9.0 with error: System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #105940
    9.0.0
  • Kerberos/Negotiate does not work with SmtpClient #105938
  • [browser] Remove make files for browser targets #105936
    Future
  • NativeAOT CppComilerAndLinker uses system linker (cross compiling) #105935
    Future
  • [mono] macOS interpreter failure in GC/Regressions/v2.0-beta2/452950/452950/452950.sh #105933
  • [Apple-mobile] Segfault when retrieving native sort key on apple platforms. #105932
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterTests.PerformanceCounter_IncrementBy_IncrementByReadOnly #105925
    Future
  • Dependency Injection fails to resolve dependency when using Primary constructor with "in" keyword #105924
    9.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: `AdvSimd.BitwiseSelect` discards side effects #105818
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks generating consolidation notice when trimming enabled #96249
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed `!"Instruction cannot be encoded: IF_DI_2A"` #105954
    9.0.0
  • Validate Native AOT experience in native debuggers #83037
    9.0.0
  • Source code compiled into `runtime.native.*` NuGet packages #105732
  • [mono] Add ByRefLike type check of generic parameters for invalid inheritance related cases #99820
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.Packaging.dll is not needed in System.IO.Packaging package for net462 target #105896
  • dotnet-counters stuck at "Waiting for initial payload..." for hostfxr-hosted application #83935
    9.0.0
  • Unexpected OOM with GCHeapLimit #94175
    9.0.0
  • StackOverflow in mscordaccore.dll #105950
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_49826/test49826/test49826.sh #91187
    9.0.0
  • Failing tests in the Mono leg doesn't fail the CI #79579
    9.0.0
  • Linux Mono DsaNotDirectlySupported Rfc3279DerSequence failed to sign #91898
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Mono coredumps when built with `_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2` forced. #82269
    9.0.0
  • Inconsistent behavior using interface with generic out and derived classes with explicit implementations #103365
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/IJW/CopyConstructorMarshaler/CopyConstructorMarshaler/CopyConstructorMarshaler.cmd #100751
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] Scan the stack for collectible ALC roots #40394
    9.0.0
  • Consolidate AOT pipeline tasks #47756
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `ConfigurationBinder.GetRequiredValue<T>` #105919
  • JIT: ARM64 `Assertion failed 'isScalableVectorSize(size)'` #101786
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: ArgumentNullException in CompileMethodCleanup #105444
  • Test failure:GC/Scenarios/GCBase1/gc_base1/gc_base1.sh #105927
  • JIT: Bad result with `AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogical` #105817
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #105926
  • JIT: avoid calling GC write barrier for byrefs #90195
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] CQ regression vs JIT - torn loop in `NonPackedIndexOfValueType` #93536
    9.0.0
  • Mono interpreter: Wrong stack size calculation of basic blocks #68757
    Future
  • Mono JIT: Wrong stack size calculation of basic blocks #68905
    Future
  • .NET exception call stack not present when running as WASM #105664
    9.0.0
  • Dereference of a managed function pointer is not invariant #91846
    9.0.0
  • Update WebAssembly Browser and Console App templates to display localhost app URLs instead of 127.0.0.1 #76769
    9.0.0
  • [WASM][MT] fail: System.TypeLoadException: Could not resolve type with token #102762
    9.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.JSDelay_ContinueWith_Sync test failed #103080
    9.0.0
  • [iOS/tvOS] BigInteger tests running out-of-memory #105753
  • Some delegate invoke thunks fail to compile with `where T : allows ref struct` delegates #105029
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs #106000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [debugger] Adding comment #105999
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix `Int128` checked-convert to signed IntX #105998
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Extend USEASG liveness to cover partial writes to retbufs #105996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable ReceiveAsync_Cancel_Success test #105995
    area-System.Net
  • ILLink analyzer: add warnings for DAM on type #105994
    area-Meta
  • Ensure we aren't containing nodes that shouldn't be contained #105993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Model GetFfr* with a special side effect and handle it in VN #105973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Ensure embedded masking is handled for emitIns_R_R #105972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove managed interfaces impls defined in CoreCLR #105965
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix copy constructor injection for unsafe value classes #105961
    arch-x86, os-windows, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Make ReflectionAccessAnalyzer logic more similar to ILLink/ILC #105956
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Support emitting array in dynamic event #105955
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Emit predicated version of the MUL instruction for Sve.Multiply() #105948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix `HybridGlobalization`, SoftHyphen is not ignored when it should be #105946
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Delete some useless RareFlags #105945
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Split trees containing no-return calls to avoid creating illegal IR #105942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • fix redundant CRLF response during SMTP negotiate #105939
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Emit Align8 flag for thread statics #105931
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix Reg Order for Float Registers #105930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix resolving types with primary constructors using in parameters #105928
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution

Merged

  • Ensure side effects are preserved for Arm64 #105963
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Use `emitIns_R_R_Imm` to handle large immediates correctly #105958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make it possible to run ILC with non-resilient mode #105951
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Emit logging before recompiling bad IL #105953
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mark ericstj as lead for area-System.Formats.Tar #105990
    area-Meta
  • Initialize RuntimeEventSource as part of coreclr_initialize instead of only when running an app #105902
    area-Host
  • [GC] Avoid OOM in large-allocation-only workloads #105521
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix NumArgs for `GetFfr*` and `CreateTrueMaskAll` HW intrinsics #105943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Partial re-revert of #104336. Only JIT fixes are included. #105596
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview7] Fix DAC stack overflow in GetUsefulGlobals API #105962
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Only ship runtime packs that are classified as mobile targets #104307
    area-Build-mono
  • Enable x86 AOT compilation for components build #105909
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix copy constructor injection for unsafe value classes #105779
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [PERF] Ensure scenario app builds are self contained #105904
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't use ZR as target in LSE atomics #105854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move exposed module object from `DomainAssembly` to `Module` #105901
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [WASI] bump WASI SDK 24 #105317
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Clean up DiagnosticContext #105848
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Fix over-shifting logic when constant-folding `AdvSimd.ShiftRight*` and `AdvSimd.ShiftLeft*` #105847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fail on LLVM version mismatch and add instructions for updating #105873
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use workstation GC in outerloop NativeAOT libs runs #105794
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Avoid scanning isinst checks when building whole program view #104148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not emit unsupported thunks for delegates with `allows ref struct` generics #105871
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "[NativeAOT] Respect Align8 flag for thread statics" #105920
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Arm64/Sve: DelayfreeUses for FMLA should take into account CndSel for RMW #105541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [EventPipe] Handle EventPipe Enable calls during shutdown #105842
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Update IncrementingPollingCounter only on Timer thread #105548
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix dump generation on background threads #105898
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Push initial defs and create initial def VNs for all tracked locals #105921
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • ILLink: Keep parameter names unless DebuggerSupport is disabled #105714
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Implement basic (recommended against) support for inheriting from COM interfaces defined in different assemblies #105119
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2509225 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetObjectData getting COM RCW/CCW #105846
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Remove BinaryReader and BinaryWriter references from ZipArchive #103153
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fixed creating generic type with abstract type when it is has a default constractor constrant #101963
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Generate FMA uses in the correct order #105723 #105885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Heap snapshot system for WASM #105713
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Support sign mismatches for small types in physical promotion #104953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Advance cursors through stores in strength reduction #105267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add support for doubly nested intrinsic classes #105761
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • fix warnings in coreclr/jit/compiler.cpp for non-Windows targets #104805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Avoid containing non-embedded conditional select #105719 #105812
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WASI] timers based on wasi:clocks #105879
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix conditional select for Zeroing predicates #102904 #105737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Ensure `ISimdVector` default implementations throw documented exceptions #104831
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • TransferEncoding chunked testing only if it is last header value #105647
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Ensure we consistently broadcast the result of simd dot product #105888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix opt value for an embedded intrinsic in ConditionalSelect (#105720) #105803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: add missing test coverage for invalid immediate (#104809) #105677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Consider methods returning constants same as substitutions #105878
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Remove check for user agent when attaching debugger #105559
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [DRAFT] JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*FirstFaulting APIs #104964
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass FP struct fields at arbitrary offsets in ArgIterator and CallDescrWorker #105800
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [browser][MT][hybridglobalization] Run `HybridGlobalization` threading tests #102595
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Avoid signed overflow in DBG_FlushInstructionCache #105918
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Detect avx512 in test infra to cover more platforms #105907
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix comments around static constructor memory #105911
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [Question] RhpGcPoll implementation. #2644

PullRequests

Merged

  • Infrastructure for swift entry point demangling #2639

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Port (most of) compiler-generated helpers to WASM #2645

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E]The workload version in ‘dotnet workload --version| --info“ should show the workload set version rather than the manifest version after set update mode to workload-set. #42527
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET9 p7 zip installed, the prompt message "update are available for the..." should be displayed after running "dotnet workload install maui --skip-manifest-update". #42526
  • [NETSDKE2E]With Net9 preview 7 zip installed, maui workload update failed: Version 9.0.0-preview.7.24405.1 of package microsoft.maui.core is not found... #42525

PullRequests

Created

  • Support launchSettings.json workingDirectory with dotnet run #42534
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • [VMR] Remove .gdnbaselines #42522
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SDK diff pipeline schedule #42529
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Enable specifying install search location options for published `apphost` #42455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting proposal #42437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Drop FirstTimeMessageAspNetCertificateLinux #42519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42518
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle Test Information from the New Testing Platform #42494
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Skip Attribute to Issue Link for Crossgen Tests #42507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-05
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Remove upper-bound span inference #8333

Updated

  • Update first-class Span speclet #8312

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When instantiating a nested class in C#, Visual Studio inappropriately adds "()" before the dot in between the outer class and the nested class. #74650
  • Old release branch signed builds are broken #74649
  • Diagnostic without location does not show full message and does not allow to click the help link #74647

Closed

  • Poor codegen for collection expression spread on nullable sources #74624
  • Add APIs to return all declared symbols in a variable declarator (fields, events, locals) #74586
    17.13
  • No warning on use of static variable before initialization #74612
  • Strange Exceptions During Binding #74574
  • Intercepting a struct rvalue instance method call with an extension method trips a debug assertion in the compiler #71657
    17.12
  • OrganizeDocument: ArgumentException: The specified SnapshotPoint is on a different ITextSnapshot than this SnapshotPoint. #74594
    17.11 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix CG issue for Microsoft.IO.Redist #74653
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove razor source generator hack #74651
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add span type inference #74646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Fix Sort Usings in Inline Diff #74645
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Erase extension types eagerly during translation of type symbols to Cci entities. #74576
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix PR collisions #74652
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • EnC: Implement support for System.Threading.Lock #74526
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type, Next
  • Insert release/dev17.12 to VS rel/d17.12 #74648
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid assert in emit layer when intercepted call implicitly captures receiver to temp #74509
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Implement remaining span conversions #74420
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

Updated

  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid optimizing away ref array access #74553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.12
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fix nested nullability of collection expressions #74490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use manual `foreach` instead of `AddRange` method for certain collection expression spreads #74630
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Handle various cases for field-backed properties #74641
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Docker build targets included with default Visual Studio templates don't work because HTTPS is half set up #57181
  • runtime and efcore dependency out of date #57179
  • ASP.NET Core Identity is logging users out after several hours #57177
  • _blazor/initializer 404 (not found) #57176
  • RequestDelegateGenerator generates invalid code for optional array parameters #57175
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #57169

Closed

  • Encoding field of multipart/form-data body is incorrect #57083
  • "Bearer" scheme is hard-coded despite the actual scheme being available in a property #57174
  • SemaphoreSlim is bypassing! #57157
  • [Blazor] Some of the default UI styling is not accessible in dark mode #57111
    9.0-rc1
  • How to get response typed result in minimal api filter #56524
  • "Skip to main content" link is not provided at top of page:A11y_ASP.NET_Movies_Create New_ByPassBlocks #56313
    Backlog
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_Login_Usability: Placeholder text for email and password field is not visible in normal mode. #51135
    Backlog
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_FetchData_ScreenReader: Narrator is announcing the column 2 & 3 as by letter TEMP C which is not conveying the meaning as Temperature in Celsius & Temperature in Fahrenheit. #49793
    Backlog
  • Blazor _framework/blazor.web.js endpoint is not configurable. #57081
    9.0-rc1
  • Issue using @microsoft/signalr with Azure Serverless in a DenoJS backend #53923

PullRequests

Created

  • Resolve potential XSS concerns from scanners in SignalR #57180
    area-signalr
  • Sharing PathNormalizer Implementations #57178
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Apply `color-scheme` to error UI #57173
    area-mvc, area-blazor
  • [MVC] Preserve type attribute when defined in Script tag helper #57170
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Improve SignalR tests to use channel #57156
    area-signalr, 9.0-rc1
  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Some of the default UI styling is not accessible in dark mode #57142
    area-blazor, 9.0-rc1
  • [Blazor][Accessibility] Display placeholders on form elements #57126
    area-mvc, 9.0-rc1
  • [Blazor][Accessibility] Add aria-label to provide alternative text for screen readers #57125
    area-mvc, area-blazor, 9.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Add Blazor Web Endpoints to the endpoint data source #57086
    area-blazor, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Use BaseTypeInfo API to fix up polymorphic schemas #56908
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Allow `<FocusOnNavigate>` to work when rendered statically #57131
    area-blazor
  • Allowing for the content type/encoding to be specified for the main Result types #55888
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use [DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledExceptions] #57148
    area-blazor
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-mvc, area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Package from Xamarin to .NET 8 MAUI #24019
  • ScrollView's Background as LinearGradientBrush behavior is different iOS vs Android #24016
  • IconTintColor Not Applied While Converting MAUI View to Platform View #24014
  • ios test flight crash #24011
  • Hot Reload fails to update XAML when Keyboard property is present #24010
  • MauiUIApplicationDelegate could not be found #24009
  • App crash after navigating back and forth to a page with many UI elements #24008
  • CollectionView has inconsistent behavior if GroupHeaderTemplate not specified #24007

Closed

  • [MAUI]The Edit Recipe page overlaps with the Recipe details page #23973
    9.0-preview7
  • On IOS - After Updating new Package Microsoft.Maui.Controls-8.0.70 App is not Compiling #23554
    .NET 8 SR8
  • MAUI 8.0 webview not loading youtube video in iOS #23792
  • Ambiguity Between IView.Arrange() and VisualElement.Arrange() #17417
    9.0-preview7
  • net8.0-android34.0 - Deployment failed on Android device with error XABLD7023: Could not find a part of the path (Microsoft.Maui.Controls.resources.dll) #23796
  • I can't create maui apps #22509
  • No Android SDK instance matching the 'C:\Program File(x86)\Android\android-sdk' path #22502
  • Broken MSBuild on Android Build .NET MAUI #21921
  • MS build pair to mac optimization #22352
    Triaged
  • Haven't found the My Mac from the list of Debug target in curl braces #22471
  • Can't publish MAUI project for android #21931
  • Blazor Hybrid Hello World - Windows - The project doesn't know how to run the profile with name 'Windows Machine' and command 'MsixPackage #22167
  • Cannot Build net8.0-ios via msbuild or Paired Mac #21657
    Backlog
  • [.NET 9 Hot Restart] - Cant build and debug MAUI application on iOS #20697
  • An error occurred trying to accept Android SDK licenses. #22527
  • My mac doesnt show up #23067
  • Cannot publish iOS from Windows after connecting to Mac #23069
  • Simulator server fail when running on alternative xcode path #23283
  • Hot Reload - Changes not supported #23521
  • CTRL+ALT+L #23591
  • Shared projects are not visible in .NET MAUI Multi-Project App. #23619
  • .NET MAUI App程序启动失败 #23643
  • Can I use webview to intercept a network request? #23982
  • MAUI NET8.0 Android HTTPClient isn't working as intend, SendAsync() and GetAsync() send nothing. But works well on Windows #23993

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Remove the 'Resources' prefix from BundleResource #24024
  • Check to see if Image Should Reload When Attached #24023
  • [iOS] Add a Container around ImageButton #24020
  • [Accessibility] Make flyout titles on iOS read as buttons #24018
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/a11y
  • Update net9 with release versions #24005

Merged

  • Remove the 'Resources' prefix from BundleResource #23978
    .NET 8 SR7
  • Fixes Android FontModel Glide In-Memory Caching #24021
    community ✨
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr7] Remove the 'Resources' prefix from BundleResource #24015
  • Fix transparent default modal background #23985
  • Use explicit platform versions #23995
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Call correct Arrange logic from VE.Arrange #23997
    9.0-preview7
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Update versions for iOS and sdk #23977

Updated

  • Build the previous TFMs #23896
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • [net9.0] Bump to RC.1 #23967
    9.0-rc1
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ThenBy after select (with previous orderby) throw exception #34363
  • Possible optimization of split querys with window functions in included entities #34362
  • DbUpdateConcurrencyException thrown in detached self referencing parent/child hierarchy relationship when replacing a parent with a child node #34361
  • ComplexProperty column naming prefixes etc #34359
  • An invalid index is being created #34358

Closed

  • Change of entity type from owned to non-owned does not trigger conventions #34244
    9.0.0
  • Big difference in execution between EF-linq and SSMS-Sql #34330

PullRequests

Merged

  • Don't implement IModelFinalizingConvention on CosmosJsonIdConvention #34343

Updated

  • Add SqlServer DATEPART support for Microsecond and Nanosecond properties. #34135
  • Support vector search on Cosmos DB #33991
  • Change default embedded discriminator property from "Discriminator" to "$type" #34340
  • New EF.Constant handling #34297
  • Introduce UseAzureSynapse and UseAzureSql #34052
  • [release/8.0] Use placeholder value to fix CredScan #34342
    tell-mode
  • Promote Json tests to Core so that they can be utilized for Cosmos. #34355
